name: Decent Abstract Creator
description:
Overview

Decent Abstract Creator - An affordable online version of Super Mario Maker!

FREE TRIAL - https://beiswenger.net/cf/dac1

Have the ability to create your very own platformer-style level online!
With 8 screens to build to your heart's desire and more than 25 different blocks to choose from, it's a great way to kill some free time!

Includes

▶ Play-testing levels
▶ More than 25 different blocks
▶ 9 different backgrounds
▶ 8 screens of space to build your level
▶ Favorites bar for blocks
▶ Zoom in/out functionality
▶ Reset button to easily clear the area
▶ Experimental invert button
▶ Save and load level codes
▶ Take screenshots of the level area
▶ Unique sound effects
▶ 4 different characters
▶ Coin counter

Enjoy!
